title: Iso50 typeface???
content:
Hi everyone, I need some help finding what typeface this is used in Scott Hansen's work also known as Iso50? Many thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [iso50-print-overlap4a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607142204/http:/typophile.com/files/iso50-print-overlap4a.jpg) | 173.14 KB |

comments.content: Kleptocracy Condensed Light is also similar, but not the same

Thank you. I would say that there are about 5 or 6 Typophiles who can ID 9/10 cases on this board without (hardly) moving their mouse! Even so, that does leave a lot of the less popular type for myself and other enthusiasts. So keep up the good work Brett... you may not get thanks very often but I appreciate your input on these boards.
